page.title: 16Events south: FINTRY
page.content: {A Sheep Trial.}Since 1961. Formerly at Culcreuch, now at Bogside Farm. Entrants: confined to 35 mile radius. Date: 1st Saturday in August. Attracts 30 competitors. All enjoy the all-day bar as much as the trial. {Flower Show.}Established 1982. Date: 3rd Saturday in August. Sections for: Locally produced flowers vegetables, arts crafts & photography. {Best Kept Village Competition. First entered in 1984, won the trophy for{Best New Entrant.}Participation in the 1985 event preceded by ambitious improvement programme. This included planting avenues of flowering trees on the 3 approach roads to the community. (We hope you can enjoy them now.) {New Year Street Dance.}Date: 2nd Jan'. when the pub opens after the holiday. A ceilidh in the pub preceeds dancing in Main Street and the Hall.
